definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
see 字紙簍|字纸篓[zi4 zhi3 lou3]

sentences.english: He ripped the letters up and threw them in the wastepaper basket.
sentences.chinese: 他把这些信撕碎，扔进字纸篓里。

sentences.english: She threw the note into a wastebasket, and fell fast asleep on a couch.
sentences.chinese: 她把便条扔进字纸篓，倒在榻上就睡熟了。

sentences.english: Those who broke this golden rule were destined for the circular file.
sentences.chinese: 那些违反这一黄金规则的履历都注定要被扔进字纸篓。

sentences.english: After reading the letter, he threw it in the waste-paper basket.
sentences.chinese: 他看了信之后，把它扔进了字纸篓。

sentences.english: He ripped the letter across and threw the halves into the basket.
sentences.chinese: 他把信件撕成两半，扔进字纸篓。

definition: drawer/stackable cooking vessel/woven mat on a bed frame or chair/woven window screen
to browse and select/to glance through and check
to rummage/to look through/to leaf through
